data.title: William Gray
data.text:
William Gray has been in the field of real estate and business education for over thirty years. He was president and CEO of the Arizona School of Real Estate and Business from 1980-2007. He was the former publisher of the Arizona Journal of Real Estate and Busines for twenty years. Mr. Gray has also published real estate manuals and numerous study aids that have helped students pass state exams. He frequently gives lectures to different business organizations and also acts as a consultant for existing and start-up business. His primary expertise and passion lie in teaching real estate and business courses to those seeking to further their education.

Mr. Gray has actively worked in real estate and business education since 1978. He works with the Arizona Department of Real Estate in preparing the content outlines that will be used when teaching real estate courses and administering state exams.

He has acted as a subject matter expert in writing questions for test preparation companies.

He also served on numerous Arizona Department of Real Estate committees, developing new rules and regulations impacting the real estate industry.
